name: Dice Prototype
description:
Fantasy Dice Prototype

Prototype of dice systems to be used in upcoming Fantasy Dice Strategy game

Controls SpaceRoll diceBackspaceReset dice1 - 9Choose number of dice and reset diceMouse movementStationary mouselookMouse scrollwheelZoom In / Out

If a die goes out of bounds or gets stuck it will automatically reset to a "ready to roll" starting position.
